coredata.dc:title: The zero-divisor graphs of rings and semirings
coredata.prism:publicationName: International Journal of Algebra and Computation

abstract.ce:para: In this paper we study zero-divisor graphs of rings and semirings. We show that all zero-divisor graphs of (possibly noncommutative) semirings are connected and have diameter less than or equal to 3. We characterize all acyclic zero-divisor graphs of semirings and prove that in the case zero-divisor graphs are cyclic, their girths are less than or equal to 4. We find all possible cyclic zero-divisor graphs over commutative semirings having at most one 3-cycle, and characterize all complete k-partite and regular zero-divisor graphs. Moreover, we characterize all additively cancellative commutative semirings and all commutative rings such that their zero-divisor graph has exactly one 3-cycle. © 2012 World Scientific Publishing Company.

item-info.copyright: Copyright 2012 Elsevier B.V., All rights reserved.

citation-title.titletext: The zero-divisor graphs of rings and semirings

affiliation.organization: Faculty of Computer and Information Science

abstract.ce:para: In this paper we study zero-divisor graphs of rings and semirings. We show that all zero-divisor graphs of (possibly noncommutative) semirings are connected and have diameter less than or equal to 3. We characterize all acyclic zero-divisor graphs of semirings and prove that in the case zero-divisor graphs are cyclic, their girths are less than or equal to 4. We find all possible cyclic zero-divisor graphs over commutative semirings having at most one 3-cycle, and characterize all complete k-partite and regular zero-divisor graphs. Moreover, we characterize all additively cancellative commutative semirings and all commutative rings such that their zero-divisor graph has exactly one 3-cycle. © 2012 World Scientific Publishing Company.
